name: ControlShift
description: ControlShift is a set of web tools that helps your organization build community, leadership, and real power among your members
author: ControlShift <talk@controlshiftlabs.com>

scripts.start: npm run-script clean:project; concurrently "webpack --env=dev --progress --profile --colors; NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --env=dev" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build:optim: npm run-script clean:project; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=prod --progress --profile --colors; webpack --env=optim  --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:pwa:optim: npm run-script clean:project; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=pwa --progress --profile --colors; webpack --env=optim  --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=pwa bundle exec jekyll build; sw-precache --config=config/sw.config.js --verbose
scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=prod --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:pwa: npm run-script clean:project; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env=pwa --progress --profile --colors; JEKYLL_ENV=pwa bundle exec jekyll build; sw-precache --config=config/sw.config.js --verbose
scripts.clean:project: if [ -e _site ]; then rm -R _site; fi; if [ -e assets ]; then rm -R assets; fi
